feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple and clean whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: first blog post!
entry.content: Finally, I managed to take out some time and port my personal portfolio website (which was earlier written in some janky React.js) to jekyll! Things are a lot more manageable now, and I’m able to focus on the site’s content instead of having to troubleshoot layout errors. Let’s see how often I end up using this blog page though.
entry.summary: finally done with personal website revamp
